pddl4j.preprocessing

Class StringEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pddl4j.preprocessing.StringEncoder

  • public final class StringEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods needed to convert the compact encoded objects used in the preprocessing into string representation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringEncoder()
      The default constructor with a private access to prevent instance creation.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(OrderConstraint orderCon,
                                        java.lang.Boolean printTag)
        Returns a String representation of an Order constraint
        Parameters:
        orderCon - the order constraint to transform
        printLabel - A boolean to say if the label first or last will appear in the taskList
        printTag - A boolean to say if the task will appear as a tag or a textual representation
        Returns:
        a String representation of the order constraint

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(OneTaskConstraint oneCon,
                                        java.lang.Boolean bOrA,
                                        java.lang.Boolean printLabel,
                                        java.lang.Boolean printTag)
        Returns a String representation of a One task constraint
        Parameters:
        oneCon - The constraint to transform
        bOrA - A boolean to say if it's a before or an after constraint true for before, false for after
        printLabel - A boolean to say if the label first or last will appear in the taskList
        printTag - A boolean to say if the task will appear as a tag or a textual representation
        Returns:
        a string representation of a one task constraint

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(TwoTasksConstraint twoCon,
                                        java.lang.Boolean bOrC,
                                        java.lang.Boolean printTag)
        Returns a String representation of a Two tasks constraint
        Parameters:
        twoCon - The constraint to transform
        bOrC - A boolean to say if it's a between or a protect constraint true for between, false for protect
        printTag - A boolean to say if the task will appear as a tag or a textual representation
        Returns:
        a string representation of a two tasks constraint
